Review: I brought this car in February 2020. As I am the new to car world, This is my first car, I feel very good comfort with safety features and infotainment system and I am using most of my car in highway road feel good, very good quick pickup, smooth drive, less engine sound inside the cabin and good suspension, very good steering. Most of the time I go with 5 adults and 2 children with comfort drive. My rating is 5 stars with all aspects
